#summary DKPro Core 1.7.0 release notes

We are pleased to announce the release of 

DKPro Core, version 1.7.0 (ASL & GPL)

a collection of interoperable software components for natural language
processing (NLP) based on the Apache UIMA framework. 

   * http://code.google.com/p/dkpro-core-asl
   * http://code.google.com/p/dkpro-core-gpl

== New API modules ==

   * api.io - new IOB encoder.

== New components ==

   * hunpos - wrapper for hunpos, a HMM pos tagger;
   * langdetect - wrapper for language-detection, a language detection tool for java;
   * mallet - wrapper for Mallet LDA;
   * textnormalizer - extension of umlautnormalizer module, having more components for text normalization.

== New I/O modules/components ==

   * io.conll - support for CoNLL 2000, CoNLL 2002, CoNLL 2009 and CoNLL 2012 formats;
   * io.ditop - support for !DiTop format;
   * io.tueppdz - support for TÃ¼PP-D/Z format.

Further highlights in this release include:

   * Support to Stanford CoreNLP caseless models;
   * Upgrade to !LanguageTools 2.7;
   * Upgrade to Stanford CoreNLP 3.4.1;
   * Support for !MaltParser's Persian model;
   * Upgrade to UIMA 2.5.0;
   * Upgrade to Commons Compress 1.7;
   * Support for MSTParser's Croatian model;
   * Upgrade to !MaltParser 1.8.

A more detailed overview of the changes in this release can be found [https://code.google.com/p/dkpro-core-asl/issues/list?can=1&q=milestone%3D1.7.0&colspec=ID+Type+Status+Priority+DKPro+Module+Milestone+Owner+Summary&cells=tiles here].

When upgrading, please mind that you should not mix different versions of DKPro Core components in your projects - they may not be compatible with each other.
